title: Pset_ServiceLifeFactors
description: Captures various factors that impact the expected service life of elements within the system or zone.

QualityOfComponents.title: QualityOfComponents
QualityOfComponents.description: Adjustment of the service life resulting from the effect of the quality of components used.

DesignLevel.title: DesignLevel
DesignLevel.description: Adjustment of the service life resulting from the effect of design level employed.

WorkExecutionLevel.title: WorkExecutionLevel
WorkExecutionLevel.description: Adjustment of the service life resulting from the effect of the quality of work executed.

IndoorEnvironment.title: IndoorEnvironment
IndoorEnvironment.description: Adjustment of the service life resulting from the effect of the indoor environment (where appropriate).

OutdoorEnvironment.title: OutdoorEnvironment
OutdoorEnvironment.description: Adjustment of the service life resulting from the effect of the outdoor environment (where appropriate)

InUseConditions.title: InUseConditions
InUseConditions.description: Adjustment of the service life resulting from the effect of the conditions in which components are operating.

MaintenanceLevel.title: MaintenanceLevel
MaintenanceLevel.description: Adjustment of the service life resulting from the effect of the level or degree of maintenance applied to dcomponents.
